//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEMiscParameter;
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DNESpecularAttenuation;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   sampler2D LightAttenuationTexture;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_0;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_1;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_2;
//   float4 ScreenDoorFadeSettings;
//   float4 ScreenDoorFadeSettings2;
//   sampler2D ScreenDoorNoiseTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   sampler2D ShadowTexture;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//   float4 SpecularOverrideParameter;
//   float TwoSidedSign;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//   bool bEnableScreenDoorFade;
//   bool bReceiveDynamicShadows;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   bEnableScreenDoorFade        b0       1
//   bReceiveDynamicShadows       b1       1
//   TwoSidedSign                 c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1
//   NvStereoEnabled              c3       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   SpecularOverrideParameter    c5       1
//   DNESpecularAttenuation       c7       1
//   DNEMiscParameter             c8       1
//   DNEResolution                c9       1
//   ScreenDoorFadeSettings       c10      1
//   ScreenDoorFadeSettings2      c11      1
//   UniformPixelVector_0         c12      1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c13      1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture           s1       1
//   LightAttenuationTexture      s2       1
//   ScreenDoorNoiseTexture       s3       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0             s4       1
//   PixelTexture2D_1             s5       1
//   PixelTexture2D_2             s6       1
//   ShadowTexture                s7       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c2, -1, 1, 10, 1.52876604
    def c6, 0.5, 0, 0.0625, 0.125
    def c14, 0.693147004, 2, -5.55472994, -6.98316002
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_texcoord1 v1.xy
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 v3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v4.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v5.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl vFace
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4
    dcl_2d s5
    dcl_2d s6
    dcl_2d s7

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --ignore-parse-errors CRC32_3A5C1EF3_3060.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    dp3_pp r0.x, v4, v4
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mad_sat_pp r0.y, c8.x, v5.w, c8.y
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.y, c7.x
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, v2
    cmp r0.z, vFace, c2.x, c2.y
    mul_pp r0.z, r0.z, c0.x
    mad_pp r2.xyz, v4, r0.x, r1
    nrm_pp r3.xyz, r2
    texld_pp r2, v1, s6
    mad_pp r0.x, r2.w, c2.z, c2.w
    exp_pp r0.x, r0.x
    texld_pp r2, v0, s7
    mov_sat_pp r2.x, r2.x
    mov r2.yw, c6.x
    texld_pp r4, r2, s0
    dp3 r0.w, v3, v3
    add r1.w, -r0.w, c2.y
    mul r5, r4.x, r1.w
    mov r6, r5
    texkill r6
    if b0
      mad r2.xy, vPos, c11.zwzw, c11
      texld_pp r6, r2, s3
      mad r1.w, c10.y, r6.x, c10.z
      mov r2.y, c2.y
      add r2.x, r2.y, -c10.x
      add r1.w, r1.w, -r2.x
      cmp r6, -r5.w, c6.y, r1.w
      texkill r6
    endif
    if b1
      mad r2.xy, vPos, c9, c9.zwzw
      mul r5.xy, r2, v5.w
      if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
        texld r6, c6.zyzw, s1
        add r1.w, -r6.y, v5.w
        mad r5.z, r6.x, r1.w, r5.x
        mov r5.xy, r5.zyzw
        mov r1.w, v5.w
      else
        mov r1.w, v5.w
      endif
      rcp r1.w, r1.w
      mul r2.xy, r1.w, r5
      mad r2.xy, r2, c1, c1.wzzw
      texld r6, r2, s2
      mul_pp r4.yzw, r6.xxyz, r6.xxyz
      mul_pp r4.yzw, r4, r4.x
    else
      mov_pp r4.yzw, r4.x
    endif
    texld_pp r6, v1, s5
    mad_pp r5.xyz, r6, c5.w, c5
    mov_sat r0.w, r0.w
    add r0.w, -r0.w, c2.y
    pow_sat_pp r2.z, r0.w, c13.w
    texld_pp r2, r2.zwzw, s0
    texld_pp r6, v1, s4
    mov r2.y, c2.y
    add_pp r2.yzw, r2.y, -c12.xxyz
    mul_pp r2.yzw, r2, r6.xxyz
    mad_pp r2.yzw, r2, c4.w, c4.xxyz
    mul_sat_pp r0.w, r1.z, r0.z
    mul_pp r1.w, r0.w, c7.w
    mul_sat_pp r3.w, r2.x, c7.y
    mul_pp r3.w, r3.w, r3.w
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, r3.w
    mul_sat_pp r0.z, r0.z, r3.z
    mad_pp r3.w, r0.x, c14.x, c14.y
    mul_pp r3.w, r3.w, c6.w
    mad r0.x, r0.x, r0.z, -r0.x
    exp_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, r3.w
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.w, r0.x
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    dp3_sat_pp r0.y, r1, r3
    mad_pp r0.z, r0.y, c14.z, c14.w
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.y, r0.z
    exp_pp r0.y, r0.y
    lrp_pp r1.xyz, r0.y, c2.y, r5
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0.x, r1
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r2.yzww, r1.w, r0
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r4.yzww, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r2.x, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c13
    cmp oC0.xyz, -r5.w, c6.y, r0
    mov oC0.w, c6.y

// approximately 100 instruction slots used (9 texture, 91 arithmetic)
